00027 POSTable::POSTable()
00028     : strTableVec_(POS_FORMAT_NUM), tableSize_(0)

00031 
00032 bool POSTable::loadConfig(const char* fileName, Knowledge::EncodeType src, Knowledge::EncodeType dest)
00033 {
00034     assert(fileName);
00035 
00036     Iconv iconv;
00037     if(! iconv.open(src, dest))
00038     {
00039         cerr << "error to open encoding conversion from " << src << " to " << dest << endl;
00040         return false;
00041     }
00042 
00043     // remove the previous table if exists
00044     tableSize_ = 0;
00045     for(unsigned int i=0; i<strTableVec_.size(); ++i)
00046         strTableVec_[i].clear();
00047 
00048     // open file
00049     ifstream from(fileName);
00050     if(! from)
00051     {
00052         return false;
00053     }
00054 
00055     // read file
00056     string line, fullPOS, partPOS, alphabetPOS;
00057     string::size_type i, j, k;
00058     const char* whitespaces = " \t";
00059 
00060     // to convert from index string to int value
00061     istringstream iss;
00062     int indexValue;
00063 
00064 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00065     cout << "load POS table: " << fileName << endl;
00066     cout << "src charset: " << src << endl;
00067     cout << "dest charset: " << dest << endl;
00068     cout << "fullPOS\t\tindex\tAlphabet partPOS" << endl;
00069 #endif
00070 
00071     // each line is assumed in the format "fullPOS index AlphabetPOS",
00072     // those lines not in this format would be ignored
00073     while(getline(from, line))
00074     {
00075         line = line.substr(0, line.find('\r'));
00076 
00077         if(line.empty())
00078             continue;
00079 
00080         // set fullPOS
00081         j = line.find_first_of(whitespaces);
00082         if(j == string::npos)
00083             continue;
00084         fullPOS = line.substr(0, j);
00085 
00086         // convert encoding
00087         if(! iconv.convert(&fullPOS))
00088         {
00089             cerr << "error to convert encoding from " << src << " to " << dest << " for POS string " << fullPOS << endl;
00090             return false;
00091         }
00092         k = fullPOS.find('*');
00093         if(k == string::npos)
00094             partPOS = fullPOS;
00095         else if(k == 0)
00096             partPOS = "";
00097         else
00098             partPOS = fullPOS.substr(0, k-1); // get "AAA" from "AAA,*"
00099 
00100         // set index
00101         i = line.find_first_not_of(whitespaces, j+1);
00102         if(i == string::npos)
00103             continue;
00104         j = line.find_first_of(whitespaces, i);
00105         if(j == string::npos)
00106             continue;
00107         iss.clear();
00108         iss.str(line.substr(i, j-i));
00109         iss >> indexValue;
00110 
00111         // set alphabetPOS
00112         i = line.find_first_not_of(whitespaces, j+1);
00113         if(i == string::npos)
00114             continue;
00115         j = line.find_first_of(whitespaces, i);
00116         if(j == string::npos)
00117             alphabetPOS = line.substr(i);
00118         else
00119             alphabetPOS = line.substr(i, j-i);
00120 
00121 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00122         cout << fullPOS << "\t" << indexValue << "\t" << alphabetPOS << "\t" << partPOS << endl;
00123 #endif
00124 
00125         if(indexValue < 0)
00126         {
00127             cerr << "the index code of POS (" << fullPOS << ", " << alphabetPOS << ") should not be a negative value: " << indexValue << endl;
00128             continue;
00129         }
00130 
00131         if(indexValue >= tableSize_)
00132         {
00133             tableSize_ = indexValue + 1;
00134             for(unsigned int i=0; i<strTableVec_.size(); ++i)
00135                 strTableVec_[i].resize(tableSize_);
00136         }
00137 
00138         strTableVec_[POS_FORMAT_DEFAULT][indexValue] = partPOS;
00139         strTableVec_[POS_FORMAT_ALPHABET][indexValue] = alphabetPOS;
00140         strTableVec_[POS_FORMAT_FULL_CATEGORY][indexValue] = fullPOS;
00141 
00142         alphaPOSMap_[alphabetPOS] = indexValue;
00143     }
00144 
00145 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00146     cout << "total " << tableSize_ << " POS loaded" << endl << endl;
00147 #endif
00148 
00149     return true;
00150 }
00151 
00152 const char* POSTable::getPOS(int index, POSFormat format) const
00153 {
00154     if(index < 0 || index >= tableSize_)
00155         return "";
00156 
00157     return strTableVec_[format][index].c_str();
00158 }

00160 bool POSTable::loadCombineRule(const char* fileName)
00161 {
00162     assert(fileName);
00163 
00164     // remove the previous table if exists
00165     ruleVec_.clear();
00166 
00167     // open file
00168     ifstream from(fileName);
00169     if(! from)
00170     {
00171         return false;
00172     }
00173 
00174     // read file
00175     string line, pos1, pos2, target;
00176     istringstream iss;
00177 
00178 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00179     cout << "load POS rule: " << fileName << endl;
00180     cout << "pos1\tpos2\ttarget" << endl;
00181 #endif
00182 
00183     // each line is assumed in the format "pos1 pos2 target",
00184     // those lines not in this format would be ignored
00185     while(getline(from, line))
00186     {
00187         if (line.empty() || line[0] == ';' || line[0] == '#')
00188             continue;
00189 
00190         iss.clear();
00191         iss.str(line);
00192         iss >> pos1 >> pos2 >> target;
00193 
00194         if(! iss)
00195         {
00196             cerr << "invalid format in rule: " << line << endl;
00197             cerr << "ignore this rule." << endl;
00198             continue;
00199         }
00200 
00201 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00202         cout << pos1 << "\t" << pos2 << "\t" << target << endl;
00203 #endif
00204 
00205         POSRule rule;
00206         rule.src1_ = getIndexFromAlphaPOS(pos1);
00207         rule.src2_ = getIndexFromAlphaPOS(pos2);
00208         rule.target_ = getIndexFromAlphaPOS(target);
00209         if(rule.src1_ < 0 || rule.src2_ < 0 || rule.target_ < 0)
00210         {
00211             cerr << "POS string is invalid in rule: " << line << endl;
00212             cerr << "ignore this rule." << endl;
00213             continue;
00214         }
00215 
00216         ruleVec_.push_back(rule);
00217     }
00218 
00219 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT
00220     cout << ruleVec_.size() << " rules are loaded." << endl;
00221 #endif
00222 
00223     return true;
00224 }
00225 
00226 int POSTable::combinePOS(int pos1, int pos2) const
00227 {
00228     assert(pos1 >= 0 && pos2 >= 0 && "POS code to combine should not be negative.");
00229 
00230 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT_COMBINE
00231     cout << strTableVec_[POS_FORMAT_ALPHABET][pos1] << " + " << strTableVec_[POS_FORMAT_ALPHABET][pos2] << " => ";
00232 #endif
00233 
00234     for(vector<POSRule>::const_iterator it=ruleVec_.begin(); it!=ruleVec_.end(); ++it)
00235     {
00236         if(pos1 == it->src1_ && pos2 == it->src2_)
00237         {
00238 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT_COMBINE
00239             cout << strTableVec_[POS_FORMAT_ALPHABET][it->target_] << endl;
00240 #endif
00241             return it->target_;
00242         }
00243     }
00244 
00245 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT_COMBINE
00246     cout << "no rule found" << endl;
00247 #endif
00248     return -1;
00249 }
00250 
00251 int POSTable::getIndexFromAlphaPOS(const std::string& posStr) const
00252 {
00253     map<std::string, int>::const_iterator it = alphaPOSMap_.find(posStr);
00254     if(it != alphaPOSMap_.end())
00255         return it->second;
00256 
00257     return -1;
00258 }
